label: Receptionists
persona: Streamline front desk operations and guest management
summary:
Front Desk Command Center

Purpose-built for reception teams in hotels, corporate offices, medical facilities, and service businesses. Everything a receptionist needs to deliver professional, efficient service while managing dozens of concurrent tasks.

Guest & Visitor Management

Digital check-in streamlines arrival for expected guests. Visitor badges print automatically with photo capture and host notification. Maintain visitor logs for security compliance. Track who's in the building at any time—essential for emergency situations. Pre-registration for recurring visitors speeds up future visits.

Appointment Scheduling

Visual calendar shows availability across rooms, resources, and staff. Book appointments with automatic confirmation emails and SMS reminders. Handle reschedules and cancellations with one click. Waitlist management captures demand during busy periods. Recurring appointment templates save time for regular meetings.

Communication Hub

Route calls intelligently based on department, time of day, and staff availability. Message center ensures nothing gets lost—even during shift changes. Emergency contact protocols provide quick access to critical information. Announcement system broadcasts important messages across locations.

Task & Request Management

Guests submit service requests through self-service kiosks or mobile app. Requests automatically route to the right department with priority flagging. Track completion status and follow up on delays. Service history helps identify patterns and improve response times.

AI-Powered Assistant

AI chatbot handles common questions: directions, hours, amenities, policies. Learns from receptionist responses to improve over time. Escalates complex queries to human staff seamlessly. Available 24/7 even when front desk is closed.

Package & Delivery Tracking

Log incoming packages with photo documentation. Automatically notify recipients via email or SMS. Track pickup with signature capture. Maintain audit trail for lost package investigations. Especially valuable for residential buildings and corporate offices.

Multi-Location Support

For businesses with multiple reception desks: Centralized contact directory, standardized procedures, and shared visitor databases. Transfer calls between locations seamlessly. Corporate guests recognized across all your properties.

Shift Handoff Excellence

Digital logbook captures important notes, pending tasks, and escalations. Outgoing receptionist flags critical items for incoming staff. No more sticky notes or verbal handoffs that get forgotten.

Empowering receptionists to be organized, responsive, and professional—even during the busiest shifts.
